attributes.action: Ban reselling of practical driving test slots.
attributes.additional_details: Many people are waiting for a test slot but certain people are taking advantage of this shortage of slots and making major profits and reselling times for starting price of £200. This is unfair and unethical especially for those from less fortunate backgrounds.
attributes.background: Put a stop to people purposefully booking test slots to resell them for at least triple the price. Either fine or make a system to prevent this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702760
